channel.title: Self Storage with Anthony McHenry
channel.description:
Everything you ever wanted to know (and more) about Self Storage

In an economy where extra space in the home or work place involves a substantial cost. People are no longer buying or renting bigger premises. It has become allot more affordable to rent a storage unit from a storage facility near you. Anthony McHenry, local storage guru talks about everything you need to know about self storage, from what to look for in a storage facility to packing your storage unit.

Self Storage complexes are popping up all over. Don't get caught up in long leases and streams of paper work. Know what you are paying for when renting a storage unit. So often the fine print is never read. Therefor listening to a podcast on these matters may provide you with information you would have never asked about.

Another Solid Gold Podcast https://SolidGold.co.za — #BeHeard

item.title: Before renting a Storage Unit – 5 Questions you need to ask | Anthony McHenry
item.itunes:title: Before renting a Storage Unit – 5 Questions you need to ask | Anthony McHenry
item.description:
Before renting a Storage Unit – 5 Questions you need to ask — Anthony McHenry Asking the right questions could save you a lot of headaches when signing a lease agreement with a storage facility. Anthony McHenry speaks about security, vermin, damp, access control and insurance of your storage unit. Know what you are paying for and what you are responsible for.


Visit the Store-Pro website http://store-pro.co.za/

item.title: Prohibited items | Anthony McHenry
item.itunes:title: Prohibited items | Anthony McHenry
item.description:
Prohibited items — Anthony McHenry Knowing what you can’t store in a self storage unit is of vital importance for your own safety and the safety of your storage facility. This also means you are not able to live in your storage unit. Yes, this is true and many have tried it and they probably won’t be the last.


Visit the Store-Pro website http://store-pro.co.za/


When you're ready to #BeHeard, contact the podcast specialists at SolidGold.co.za

item.itunes:author: Anthony McHenry | Solid Gold Podcasts
item.title: Handy Tips, Deceased Estates, Safety and Security | Anthony McHenry
item.itunes:title: Handy Tips, Deceased Estates, Safety and Security | Anthony McHenry
item.description:
Handy Tips, Deceased Estates, Safety and Security — Anthony McHenry Gain knowledge on how to pack your storage unit so you can access anything easily once packed. Anthony talks about safety and security of your storage unit. He also speaks briefly about an affordable device coming to market that will alert you if there is movement on your door of your self storage unit. Anthony also touches on what happens to the contents of a storage unit when dealing with a deceased estate.


Visit the Store-Pro website http://store-pro.co.za/


When you're ready to #BeHeard, contact the podcast specialists at SolidGold.co.za
